metaData.label: targeted
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_2 equal Infectious Diseases OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Urology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal General Surgery OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pneumology OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Hospital Pharmacy
